title: DepthOfFieldEffect

    "content": "This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: DepthOfFieldEffect
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  Simulates a camera lens by blurring parts of a scene not in focus.
description: |
  The DepthOfFieldEffect simulates a camera lens by blurring parts of a
  scene not in focus. Distant objects can be blurred or this effect can be used
  to focus on specific parts of a scene, like an item in an in-game shop.

  Like other post-processing effects, DepthOfFieldEffect will only work
  while Class.PostEffect.Enabled|Enabled and when parented to Class.Lighting
  or Class.Workspace.CurrentCamera. Also, it may render differently on low-end
  devices or depending on your Studio settings (see the Quality Level
  settings in Rendering → Performance).

  For more details on this effect and others, see
  Post-Processing Effects.


codesamples: []
inherits:
  - PostEffect
descendants: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: DepthOfFieldEffect.FarIntensity
    summary: |
      Intensity of the far field blur.
    description: |
      Intensity of the far field blur, moving out in distance from the
      Class.DepthOfFieldEffect.FocusDistance|FocusDistance point plus
      Class.DepthOfFieldEffect.InFocusRadius|InFocusRadius value.


    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Environment
  - name: DepthOfFieldEffect.FocusDistance
    summary: |
      Distance away from the camera where objects are in focus.
    description: |
      Controls the distance away from the camera (in studs) where objects are in
      focus.


    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Environment
  - name: DepthOfFieldEffect.InFocusRadius
    summary: |
      Controls the distance away from the
      Class.DepthOfFieldEffect.FocusDistance|FocusDistance where no blur is
      applied.
    description: |
      Controls the distance away from the
      Class.DepthOfFieldEffect.FocusDistance|FocusDistance (on both sides)
      where no blur is applied. Measured in studs.


    codesamples: []
    type: float
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Environment
  - name: DepthOfFieldEffect.NearIntensity
    summary: |
      Intensity of the near field blur.
    description: |
      Intensity of the near field blur, between the camera and the
      Class.DepthOfFieldEffect.FocusDistance|FocusDistance point minus
      Class.DepthOfFieldEffect.InFocusRadius|InFocusRadius value.


    codesamples: []
    type: float
